mapper.sql: id, role_code, role_name, role_type, sort_order, status, remark, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT r.role_code FROM user u JOIN user_role ur ON ur.user_id = u.id JOIN role r ON r.id = ur.role_id WHERE u.username = #{username} AND u.deleted = 0 AND r.deleted = 0 AND (r.status = 1)
